sentences: During the afternoon ADP informal meeting, parties expressed their views on how to move forward in a pragmatic way.
Many regarded specific submissions by parties as a helpful way forward.
Some parties expressed the need to change the modus operandi to provide time and space for concrete decision-making.
One party noted that workshops and roundtables provide a safe environment where parties can dissect certain topics.
Another mentioned the possibility of a combination of modalities to avoid risking that parties will be sent back to their respective positions.
